logiclayer

Class CarLogicImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • logiclayer.CarLogicImpl

  • public class CarLogicImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the controller class for all the functionalities of cars. It directly interacts with the Servlet and car persistent layer classes.
    Author:
    Connor Kirk

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      This method takes information about a car and calls the CarPersistImpl to insert it into the database.

      This method calls the CarPersistImpl to remove an entry from the images table with the corresponding id.

      This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet containing an entry the car with the id given as a parameter.

      This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to insert the given image and carId into the image table, and also return a ResultSet containing the entry.

        public CarLogicImpl()
        Default constructor. Creates a new object of CarPersistImpl.

    • Method Detail

      • getCars

        public java.util.List<Car> getCars()
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet of all calls in the database. It then processes the ResultSet into a list of Car objects.
        Returns:
        A list of car objects.

      • getCarsWithParams

        public java.util.List<Car> getCarsWithParams(java.lang.String make,
                                             java.lang.String carType,
                                             java.lang.String model)
        This method calls the persist layer to search the database for cars with the given parameters. It processes the results into a list of Car objects. The list is returned.
        Parameters:
        make - Make to search database for.
        carType - CarType to search database for.
        model - Model to search database for.
        Returns:
        List of Car objects containing the search results.

      • getTypes

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTypes()
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet of all types in the database. It then processes the ResultSet into a list of strings containing all of the types.
        Returns:
        A list of strings containing types of cars.

      • getModels

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getModels()
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet of all models in the database. It then processes the ResultSet into a list of strings containing all of the models.
        Returns:
        A list of strings containing models of cars.

      • getMakes

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMakes()
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet of all makes in the database. It then processes the ResultSet into a list of strings containing all of the makes.
        Returns:
        A list of strings containing makes of cars.

      • getCar

        public Car getCar(int id)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet containing an entry the car with the id given as a parameter. It then processes the ResultSet into a single Car object.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the car to get.
        Returns:
        The corresponding Car object.

      • getCarsFromUser

        public java.util.List<Car> getCarsFromUser(int ownerId)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet of all calls belonging to a given user in the database. It then processes the ResultSet into a list of Car objects.
        Parameters:
        ownerId - The id of the owner whose cars to get.
        Returns:
        A list of car objects.

      • addCar

        public int addCar(int ownerId,
                  java.lang.String make,
                  java.lang.String model,
                  java.lang.String year,
                  java.lang.String color,
                  java.lang.String price,
                  java.lang.String description,
                  java.lang.String carType)
        This method takes information about a car and calls the CarPersistImpl to insert it into the database. This method will then return the id of the car after it was inserted.
        Parameters:
        ownerId - Id of owner.
        make - Make of car.
        model - Model of car.
        year - Year of car.
        color - Color of ccar.
        price - Price per day of car.
        description - Description of car.
        carType - Body type of car.
        Returns:
        The id of the car after it is inserted in the database.

      • editCar

        public void editCar(int id,
                    java.lang.String make,
                    java.lang.String model,
                    java.lang.String year,
                    java.lang.String color,
                    java.lang.String price,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    java.lang.String carType)
        This method takes information about a car and calls the CarPersistImpl to edit the entry in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the car.
        make - Make of the car.
        model - Model of the car.
        year - Year of the car.
        color - Color of the car.
        price - Price per day of the car.
        description - Description of the car.
        carType - Body type of the car.

      • getOwnerId

        public int getOwnerId(int id)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet containing the ownerId of the car with the given id. This method then processes the ResultSet and returns a string containing the ownerId of the car.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the car.
        Returns:
        Id of the owner.

      • deleteCar

        public void deleteCar(int id)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl to delete the entry in the database with the given carId.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the car to delete.

      • putImage

        public Image putImage(java.io.InputStream image,
                      int carId)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to insert the given image and carId into the image table, and also return a ResultSet containing the entry. This method will then process the ResultSet to create an Image object containing the image as a String.
        Parameters:
        image - InputStream of image.
        carId - Id of car.
        Returns:
        Image object of given image and carId.

      • getImages

        public java.util.List<Image> getImages(int carId)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather all entries in the images table corresponding to the given carId, process the ResultSet into a list of Image objects, and return the list.
        Parameters:
        carId - Id of the car.
        Returns:
        List of Image objects that belong to carId.

      • getOwnerOfImage

        public int getOwnerOfImage(int id)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl to create a ResultSet containing car information of a given image. This method then returns the owner of the car as an int.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the image.
        Returns:
        Id of the owner of the image and car.

      • deleteImage

        public void deleteImage(int id)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl to remove an entry from the images table with the corresponding id.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the image.

      • getMakes

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMakes(java.lang.String content)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet of all makes in the database filtered by the parameter content. It then processes the ResultSet into a list of strings containing the resulting makes.
        Parameters:
        content - A string to search the makes table for.
        Returns:
        A list of strings containing makes of cars filtered by content.

      • getTypes

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTypes(java.lang.String content)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet of all types in the database filtered by the parameter content. It then processes the ResultSet into a list of strings containing the resulting types.
        Parameters:
        content - A string to search the types table for.
        Returns:
        A list of strings containing types of cars filtered by content.

      • getModels

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getModels(java.lang.String content)
        This method calls the CarPersistImpl class to gather a ResultSet of all models in the database filtered by the parameter content. It then processes the ResultSet into a list of strings containing the resulting models.
        Parameters:
        content - A string to search the models table for.
        Returns:
        A list of strings containing models of cars filtered by content.
